mixins.description: Mixin that provides web-color-properties. Its value converts automatically beetween different formats (hex, rgb and hsl) and provides an alpha-value.

properties.name: hslPrecision
properties.description: Precision of hsl-values, if the format is 'hsl' (for saturation and lightness it is applied according to their percentage value)

mixins.name: ColorMixin

attributes.name: hsl-precision
attributes.description: Precision of hsl-values, if the format is 'hsl' (for saturation and lightness it is applied according to their percentage value)

properties.name: datetime
properties.description: the selected local date and time (format: iso8601)

properties.name: year
properties.description: The year of the selected local date

properties.name: month
properties.description: The month of the selected local date (starts with 1)

properties.name: day
properties.description: The day of the selected local date

properties.name: hours
properties.description: The hours of the selected local time

properties.name: minutes
properties.description: The minutes of the selected local time

properties.name: seconds
properties.description: The seconds of the selected local time

properties.name: milliseconds
properties.description: The milliseconds of the selected local time

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value of the selected local date

properties.name: default
properties.description: The default value of the input

properties.name: min
properties.description:
The minimal local date,
could be a number, a date-object or an iso-string

properties.name: max
properties.description:
The maximal local date,
could be a number, a date-object or an iso-string

properties.name: clamp
properties.description:
Clamp datetime to a property
possible values:'month', 'day', 'hours', 'minutes', 'seconds', 'milliseconds'

properties.name: timezone
properties.description: The local timezone offset in '±hh:mm' format

properties.name: _timezoneOffset
properties.description: The offset minutes of the set timezone

properties.name: _recentLocalTimezoneOffset
properties.description: The offset minutes of the current datetime

properties.name: _localDateSeparator
properties.description: Separator for local date values (date-string is still in ISO-Format)

properties.name: _localTimeSeparator
properties.description: Separator for local time values (time-string is still in ISO-Format)

properties.name: _dateLocked
properties.description: lock to date and ignore time

methods.name: now
methods.description: Sets value to the actual date

methods.name: _setDate
methods.description: [_setDate sets date to all necessary properties]

mixins.description: mixin to provide a range behavior for a given value

properties.name: step
properties.description: step for changing the input (referencing to `min` or `0`)

properties.name: saturate
properties.description: if true, the value does not revolve the range according to the maximum or the minimum

properties.name: noClamp
properties.description: if true, the value does not clamp according to the given step

mixins.name: RangeMixin

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: step for changing the input (referencing to `min` or `0`)

attributes.name: saturate
attributes.description: if true, the value does not revolve the range according to the maximum or the minimum

attributes.name: no-clamp
attributes.description: if true, the value does not clamp according to the given step
